post.description:
Run the content repurposing agent to transform content.

Returns:
    RepurposedContent with all versions

Run the data analyst agent to answer questions about data.

Returns:
    DataAnalysisResult with insights

Run the email draft agent to compose an email.

Returns:
    EmailDraft with composed email

get.description: List available content repurposing formats.

post.description:
Run the proofreading agent for comprehensive style and grammar check.

Returns:
    ProofreadingResult with corrections

Run the research agent to compile a report on a topic.

Returns:
    ResearchReport with findings

get.description: List all tasks, optionally filtered by agent type.
Get task by ID.
List available agent types.

post.description: Transform content into multiple formats (tweets, LinkedIn, slides, newsletters, etc.).
Analyse tabular data: answer questions, compute statistics, suggest charts, generate SQL.
Compose email drafts with tone control, thread context, and follow-up actions.

get.description: List available content repurposing target formats with descriptions.
Check if the agents service is healthy.

post.description: Grammar, style, and clarity checking with style guide support and readability scoring.

Run the research agent to compile a comprehensive report on a topic.

    The agent will:
    1. Generate a research outline based on the topic and depth
    2. Research each section with relevant findings
    3. Synthesize findings into a cohesive report with recommendations

    **Idempotency**: Provide an `idempotency_key` to ensure the same request
    doesn't create duplicate tasks. If a task with the same key exists,
    it will be returned instead of creating a new one.

    **Async Mode**: Set `sync=false` to return immediately with task ID.
    Poll the task endpoint or use webhook for completion notification.

get.description: Get task counts by status.
List tasks with optional filtering by agent type, status, or user.
Get a task by ID with full status, progress, and result information.

post.description: Cancel a pending or running task. Cannot cancel completed tasks.

get.description: Get audit trail events for a task.

schema.title: Response Get Task Events Api V1 Agents V2 Tasks  Task Id  Events Get

post.description: Manually retry a failed task. Only works for retryable failures.

get.description: List available agent types with descriptions.

post.description:
Generate new content based on a prompt.

Returns:
    Generated content string.

Expand text with additional details and examples.

Returns:
    ExpandResult with expanded text and word counts.

Check text for grammar, spelling, and style issues.

Returns:
    GrammarCheckResult with issues, corrected text, and quality score.

Status codes:
    200: Success
    400: Invalid input (text too long)
    503: AI service temporarily unavailable

Rewrite text with specified tone.

Returns:
    RewriteResult with rewritten text and list of changes.

Summarize text with optional length limit.

Returns:
    SummarizeResult with summary, key points, and compression ratio.

Translate text to target language.

Returns:
    TranslateResult with translated text and confidence score.

get.description: Check if AI services are configured and available.

post.description:
Detect anomalies in spreadsheet data.

Returns:
    AnomalyDetectionResult with detected anomalies.

Analyze data for quality issues and provide cleaning suggestions.

Returns:
    DataCleaningResult with suggestions and quality score.

Explain what a formula does in plain language.

Returns:
    FormulaExplanation with detailed breakdown.

Convert natural language description to spreadsheet formula.

Returns:
    FormulaResult with formula, explanation, and alternatives.

Generate predictions for a new column based on existing data.

Returns:
    PredictionColumn with predictions and confidence scores.

Suggest useful formulas based on data structure.

Returns:
    List of suggested formulas with explanations.

post.description:
Perform what-if scenario analysis.

Evaluates how changes to input variables might affect
a target variable based on historical relationships.
Quickly extract raw tables and text without full AI analysis.

Upload a document (PDF or Excel) and analyze it with AI.

Returns a streaming NDJSON response with progress updates and final results.
Use background=true to queue the analysis as a job.

Events:
- stage: Progress update with stage name and percentage
- error: Error occurred, includes detail message
- result: Final analysis result
Compare two analyzed documents.

Upload and analyze a document with AI-powered analysis.

Returns streaming NDJSON events with progress and final result.

**Features:**
- Intelligent table extraction with cross-page stitching
- Entity and metric extraction (dates, money, percentages, etc.)
- Form and invoice parsing
- Multi-mode summaries (executive, data, comprehensive, etc.)
- Sentiment and tone analysis
- Statistical analysis with outlier detection
- Auto-generated visualizations
- AI-powered insights, risks, and opportunities
- Predictive analytics
Register a webhook for analysis events.
Send a test webhook event.

Initiates a sync operation for the connection and records the sync
status in the persistent state store under ``connector_sync_status``.

schema.title: Response Start Connection Sync Api V1 Connectors  Connection Id  Sync Post

post.description:
Schedule periodic sync for a connection.

Stores the schedule configuration in the state store under
``connector_sync_status`` so that a background worker can pick it
up.  The *interval_minutes* field must be between 5 and 1440 (24h).

get.description:
Get the sync status for a connection.

Returns the most recent sync status from the state store.  If no
sync has been run yet, a ``never_synced`` status is returned.

get.description: List all dashboards.

post.description: Create a new dashboard.

Detect anomalies in data.

Runs anomaly detection on each requested column via the
analytics AnomalyService.  Results are aggregated across columns.

Note: only ``zscore`` method is currently implemented in the
analytics engine.  ``iqr`` and ``isolation_forest`` are accepted
for forward compatibility but fall back to z-score with a warning.

Find correlations between columns.

Extracts numeric columns from the data dicts and delegates to the
analytics CorrelationService.

Generate AI insights from data.

Converts raw data dicts into DataSeries and delegates to the
analytics InsightService.

Predict future trends from time series data.

Extracts the named value column from the data dicts and delegates
to the analytics TrendService.

post.description: Set a theme as the active theme.

Classify a document by type.

Determines document category (invoice, contract, resume, receipt, etc.)
and suggests appropriate parsers for further processing.

Compare two documents.

Calculates similarity, identifies differences, and optionally
performs semantic comparison to find meaningful changes.

Check document for regulatory compliance.

Analyzes document against specified regulations (GDPR, HIPAA, SOC2)
and identifies violations and recommendations.

Extract named entities from a document.

Identifies and extracts entities like persons, organizations,
locations, dates, monetary values, emails, phones, and URLs.

Analyze a contract document.

Extracts parties, clauses, obligations, key dates, and performs
risk analysis on contract documents.

Parse an invoice document and extract structured data.

Extracts invoice number, dates, vendor/billing info, line items,
and totals from invoice documents (PDF, images, or text).

Scan a receipt document.

Extracts merchant info, date/time, line items, totals, and
payment information from receipt images or PDFs.

Parse a resume/CV document.

Extracts contact info, education, work experience, skills,
certifications, and can optionally match against a job description.

Perform semantic search across documents.

Uses embeddings to find semantically similar content
rather than exact keyword matches.

Summarize multiple documents.

Creates a unified summary across multiple documents,
identifying key points and common themes with source references.
